title: Ep6 Munchausen's Syndrome
description: This week, the gals discuss the motivations and methods of Munchausen's Syndrome and Munchausen by Proxy Syndrome. Pick up a bottle of Melodramatic Red Blend and tune in for the psychology behind faking illness, a mother-daughter duo who toe the "by proxy" line, and a recent case that involves a lifetime of lies, Miranda Lambert, and murder. But no teeth.
itunes:author: Wine & Crime Podcast
dc:creator: Wine & Crime Podcast
